title: Total number of stores of the LVMH Group worldwide 2008 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total number of stores, containing a total of 12 data points.
Overall Total number of stores has increased over the Year.
Total number of stores is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Total number of stores, about 4915.0 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Total number of stores, of value 2314.0 was reported at Year 2008
